## Domodule.getOption() method

Returns the value of a single option in the module.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getOption(option: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  option | string | The option's index. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

The option's value.
